ThingDef.label: persona Independent Worlds Pistol
ThingDef.description: A simple non-Illuminate pistol. Whilst dealing less damage and having a slightly shorter range when compared to its Terran counterpart, it makes up for this by using coil technology for a better firing rate and more medium range viability.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona Independent Worlds battle rifle
ThingDef.description: A popular non-Illuminate battle rifle. The design of these simple rifles has quickly spread throughout the Rimworld to offer Avali both defensive and hunting capacities. Together with a regular old blowback-action design and its fast but small bullet, it brings a decent fire-rate and equally decent range to the table.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

This causes the weapon to still attract Avali sharpshooters that seek something reliable and simple to arm themselves with.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Whilst it doesn’t receive the same love from Avali sharpshooters that the other rifles receive, it certainly finds its favour by Avali who prefer more suppressing fire.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person.
